text.tspan: Bungeni module contains most of the system logic and
Common module contains most of the utility functions
Route module was introduced to factor-out some of the
Framework module does all URL re-writing that app-
This module handles all requests and does routing to
approproriate pages. Utilizes rou: and cmn: in rendering
the menu and template: to parse xsl/xml documents.
The Bungeni eXist portal is based on a flexible XQuery web framework powered by eXist XML DB.
